H0.text: In fashion, who designed the ‘New Look’ in 1947. Cristobal Balenciaga

H1.text: In fashion, who designed the ‘New Look’ in 1947. Hubert de Givenchy

H2.text: In fashion, who designed the ‘New Look’ in 1947. Pierre Balmain

H3.text: In fashion, who designed the ‘New Look’ in 1947. Dior Monsieur

A4.text: In 1947, the collection debuted featuring rounded shoulders, a cinched waist, and very full skirt.
